byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Yahoo finds itself in a familiar situation: The struggling Internet giant announced it was weighing a sale of its core web operations as criticism of company management mounts.

headline.main: Yahoo Again Considers Selling Itself as Investor Pressure Rises

snippet: Yahoo finds itself in a familiar situation: The struggling Internet giant announced it was weighing a sale of its core web operations as criticism of company management mounts.
